publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3589# Karen Gillon: The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG-That the Parliament notes the proposed sale by Scottish Media Group of the titles The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times; recognises the contribution these titles make in providing Scotland with diverse media, and therefore considers that the Scottish Executive should make representations to Her Majesty's Government to ensure that any sale does not lead to a monopoly situation. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Irene McGugan*, Mr John McAllion*

S1M-3589# The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG (lodged on 15 November 2002) Jackie Baillie*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Tavish Scott*, Stewart Stevenson*, Donald Gorrie*, Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*, Susan Deacon*, Mr John Home Robertson*
S1M-3589# The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG (lodged on 15 November 2002) Scott Barrie*, Linda Fabiani*, Alex Neil*

S1M-3589# The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG (lodged on 15 November 2002) Trish Godman*, Helen Eadie*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Sandra White*, Elaine Thomson*, Sarah Boyack*, Rhona Brankin*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Bill Butler*, Robert Brown*, Paul Martin*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mr George Reid*, Bristow Muldoon*, Angus MacKay*

S1M-3589# The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG (lodged on 15 November 2002) Rhoda Grant*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Maureen Macmillan*, Fiona McLeod*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Alasdair Morgan*, Nora Radcliffe*, Des McNulty*
S1M-3589# The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG (lodged on 15 November 2002) Cathy Peattie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Shona Robison*, Ian Jenkins*
S1M-3589# The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG (lodged on 15 November 2002) Johann Lamont*, Michael Russell*
S1M-3589# The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG (lodged on 15 November 2002) Fergus Ewing*

S1M-3589# The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG (lodged on 15 November 2002) Colin Campbell*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Duncan McNeil*, Mr Gil Paterson*, John Farquhar Munro*, Mr Tom McCabe*, Dennis Canavan*, Karen Whitefield*, Cathie Craigie*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Pauline McNeill*, Janis Hughes*, Gordon Jackson*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Richard Lochhead*, Kate Maclean*, Margaret Smith*, Tricia Marwick*, Bruce Crawford*, Kay Ullrich*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Mr Mike Rumbles*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Andrew Wilson*, Brian Adam*, Iain Smith*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Ms Wendy Alexander*
S1M-3589# The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG (lodged on 15 November 2002) Irene Oldfather*
S1M-3589# The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG (lodged on 15 November 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*

S1M-3589# Karen Gillon: The Sale of The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times by SMG-That the Parliament notes the proposed sale by Scottish Media Group of the titles The Herald, Sunday Herald and Evening Times; recognises the contribution these titles make in providing Scotland with diverse media, and therefore considers that the Scottish Executive should make representations to Her Majesty's Government to ensure that any sale does not lead to a monopoly situation. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick, Michael Matheson, Mr Michael McMahon, Irene McGugan, Mr John McAllion, Jackie Baillie, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Robin Harper, Margaret Jamieson, Mr Keith Raffan, Tavish Scott, Stewart Stevenson, Donald Gorrie, Christine Grahame, Fiona Hyslop, Susan Deacon, Mr John Home Robertson, Scott Barrie, Linda Fabiani, Alex Neil, Trish Godman, Helen Eadie, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Sandra White, Elaine Thomson, Sarah Boyack, Rhona Brankin, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Bill Butler, Robert Brown, Paul Martin, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Mr George Reid, Bristow Muldoon, Angus MacKay, Rhoda Grant, Mr Adam Ingram, Maureen Macmillan, Fiona McLeod, Mr Jamie Stone, Roseanna Cunningham, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Alasdair Morgan, Nora Radcliffe, Cathy Peattie, Marilyn Livingstone, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Shona Robison, Ian Jenkins, Johann Lamont, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Colin Campbell, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Duncan McNeil, Mr Gil Paterson, John Farquhar Munro, Mr Tom McCabe, Irene Oldfather, Dennis Canavan, Karen Whitefield, Cathie Craigie, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Pauline McNeill, Janis Hughes, Gordon Jackson, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Richard Lochhead, Kate Maclean, Margaret Smith, Tricia Marwick, Bruce Crawford, Kay Ullrich, Ms Margo MacDonald, Mr Mike Rumbles, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Brian Adam, Iain Smith, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Nicola Sturgeon, Mr Andrew Welsh, Ms Wendy Alexander, Dr Winnie Ewing
